response.overview: Communication with the deceased has always been a question of faith and hope and reserved for people with special senses and abilities. The fear of death is a motor of progress and change. The rituals of mourning and death are as old as our cultures. This documentary takes you into a sphere beyond our previous knowledge. Deep insights into recorded voice research and modern transcommunication by Sonia Rinaldi. Witness how Dr. Gary E. Schwartz reported to the director of the Laboratory for Advances in Consciousness and Health in Arizona for the first time on camera about the research results of Soulphone technology.
response.title: Digital Soul - Schnittstelle ins Jenseits
